elements.label: Inspiration Used: Natural World
elements.description: This song has already used nature as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration Used: Melody
elements.description: This song has already used a melody as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration Used: Muse
elements.description: This song has already used a muse as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.description: This song has already used a story as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration Used: Experience
elements.description: This song has already used an experience as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration Used: Location
elements.description: This song has already used a location for inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration Used: Instrument
elements.description: This song has already used an instrument as inspiration, and can't be improved by it further. There are other inspirations.

elements.label: Inspiration: Natural World
elements.description: A piece of music devoid of the natural world is as good as dead sound.

elements.label: Inspiration: Melody
elements.description: All artists borrows from their predecessors. Do it well, and it might be considered homage instead of theft.

elements.label: Inspiration: Muse
elements.description: This one embodies a certain kind of music. It ripples from their words, their skin, their being.

elements.label: Inspiration: Story
elements.description: This story touches topics universal to humanity.

elements.label: Inspiration: Life Lesson
elements.description: I have felt what all can recognize with an intensity that few ever know.

elements.label: Inspiration: Location
elements.description: Here the air is laden with themes beyond the real.

elements.label: Inspiration: Attuned Instrument
elements.description: It still carries the tunes of players' past.
